title: Drawing, "Chest of Drawers (Three) with Bookcase", ca. 1930s
medium:
Graphite; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed dimensions, instructions Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 8 Inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P
description:
Scale: 1"-1'

Three-drawer chest joined at base to bookcase and extending to height of third shelf up of four-shelf bookcase. Horizontal pulls left and right, each drawer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Chest of Drawers (Three) with Bookcase", ca. 1930s.
ca. 1930s. Graphite; ruled border in graphite
Support: tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-689.
